title: Data Automation Specialist
description: We are looking for an expert in Airtable and Google Spreadsheets to help us automate the process of exporting data from spreadsheets and uploading it to Airtable. The successful candidate will play a crucial role in optimizing our data management workflows, ensuring data accuracy, and making data accessible to multiple users, each with their own account. Responsibilities: Develop and implement automated data export/import processes between Google Spreadsheets and Airtable. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and design efficient solutions. Ensure data integrity and accuracy during the transfer process. Create user-friendly interfaces or scripts to allow multiple users to interact with the data automation tool. Provide training and support to users on how to utilize the tool effectively. Troubleshoot and resolve any issues related to data automation. Qualifications: Proven expertise in Airtable and Google Spreadsheets. Strong understanding of data management principles. Experience with data automation and scripting (JavaScript, Google Apps Script, etc.). Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Strong communication and collaboration abilities. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Prior experience with user access management and security considerations is a plus.

title: Angular developer
description: Responsibilities: - Build and maintain a website with an integrated inventory management system with an associated app - Able to develop and design a website and an app. - Frontend and backend development - Design and implement user-friendly interfaces that are visually appealing and responsive - Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code - Conduct thorough testing and debugging of web applications to ensure high performance and functionality - Stay up-to-date with emerging web development trends and technologies Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field - Proven experience as a Web Developer or similar role with a resume or portfolio required - Proficient in web development languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript - Strong knowledge of Angular 6+ - Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and development tools (e.g., Visual Studio Code) - Experience with RESTful APIs and integrating third-party services - Understanding of UI/UX principles and best practices. - Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment. This is a contract-based job. If you are a talented Web Developer who is passionate about creating innovative web solutions, we would love to hear from you. Join our dynamic team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge web applications and apps. Please note that only qualified candidates will be contacted for further consideration.

title: Software Developer - Excel to User-Friendly Application Transformation
description: Job Description: We are on the lookout for a skilled Software Developer to transform our existing Excel documents into a user-friendly, intuitive software application. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software development, with expertise in creating streamlined and visually appealing interfaces. The primary focus is on improving usability and enhancing the overall user experience while ensuring seamless data export capabilities to PDF and Excel files. Responsibilities: 1. Collaborate closely with stakeholders to understand data processing needs and user requirements. 2. Develop a user-friendly software application, transforming existing Excel functionalities into an intuitive interface. 3. Prioritize and implement features that enhance overall usability and user experience. 4. Integrate efficient data export functionalities, allowing users to export data seamlessly to PDF and Excel formats. 5. Conduct thorough testing to ensure the software is robust, reliable, and user-friendly. 6. Provide documentation and training materials to assist users in navigating and utilizing the new software effectively. Requirements: 1. Proven experience in software development with a focus on creating user-friendly interfaces. 2. Strong proficiency in relevant programming languages and frameworks. 3. Ability to understand and work with complex data structures from Excel documents. 4. Experience in optimizing software applications for efficient data export to PDF and Excel. 5. Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. 6. Demonstrated commitment to usability and user experience principles. To apply, please submit your resume, a portfolio showcasing previous software development projects, and a cover letter detailing your experience in creating user-friendly interfaces and optimizing data export functionalities. Join our team and contribute to the transformation of our data management processes, making them more accessible, user-friendly, and efficient. We look forward to welcoming a talented Software Developer to drive this exciting initiative.

title: PHP for an old browsergame (text only)
description:
This is a private Project!

I´m looking for someone to help me create an event for an old text-based browsergame. Many thigs are already existing and can be re-used in some way.

- Create the necessary classes with functions
- Create the editor for comfortable usage for the team
- Create the database tables most effective
- Create the event-overview in existing css-design

You can imagine it like:
500 times someone has to click on the big red button
The Overview shows a progress-bar 0/500, counting every time someone clicks the big red button.
If 500 is full, everyone who participated will get the bonus for this task.
It has to reset monthly.
There will be a few events each month at the same time, starting on the 1st and ending on the last day at midnight.
Each Event (I will create them in the editor) will have a value (like from 1-5 as 1 is easy and 5 is difficult) and each month there should be events for like 8 points by random.
If all events are fulfilled, everyone who participated, will get the 2nd, big bonus.

The Editor may contain the following  options:
Counter
Type
Value

I will for example create 5 Counters (1, 10, 25, 50, 100).
I will for example create 5 Types (click red button, click green button, spend gold, use XY, die).
I will for example create 5 Values (1-5)
These have to be saved in the databse.
Out of this I will get the event creator, that provides me 3 dropdowns: Counter, Type, Value... and so I can create:
1. Event: 10, click red button, 1
2. Event: 100, die, 5
and so on.

What I will do:
- Create all the variables and events in the editor
- Place all the class-functions at the places where they will be triggered
- Test
- Provide the existing code as far as it is needed

title: Custom WordPress Theme Developer
description: We are seeking a skilled Custom WordPress Theme Developer to join our team. As a developer, you will be responsible for creating unique and responsive WordPress themes from scratch based on client requirements. You should have a strong understanding of WordPress functionality and be able to convert PSD files into fully functional WordPress themes. The ideal candidate will have experience with custom post types, custom fields, and customizing existing themes. Skills required: - WordPress development - PHP - HTML/CSS - JavaScript/jQuery - PSD to WordPress conversion - Custom plugin development This is a medium-sized project that will require a commitment of 1 to 3 months. We expect the developer to work closely with our team and meet project deadlines. The right candidate should have an intermediate level of expertise in WordPress development and should be able to provide examples of their previous work.

title: Build app-based solution to connect U.S. & Guinea & global agricultural stakeholders
description:
Project Deliverables: 
∙ User-friendly mobile applications for farmers, TRP, and buyers.  
∙ Admin portal for the TRP.  
∙ Loan management system.  
∙ Real-time supply chain tracking.  
∙ Onboarding and Verification  
∙ Notification via Push, SMS, Email  

Project Overview: The BLOCFARM Project aims to create a blockchain-based agricultural solution that connects farmers, a trading and processing company (TRP), and buyers. This system will streamline the agricultural supply chain by enabling farmers to register, receive loans, and communicate with the TRP,  while the TRP can manage operations through an admin portal, distributing loans and tracking supply and demand. Buyers can input demand, make payments, and track their orders. The project will be divided into two phases.

title: Design Expert E
description: The Design Expert is responsible for creating and implementing engaging designs, using a variety of materials and technologies. This includes creating user interfaces, graphics, logos, banners, and other types of visual elements. The role requires a high level of creativity, knowledge of design software, and an eye for detail. Key Responsibilities • Create designs for web, mobile, print media, and other mediums according to business objectives. • Develop user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) concepts. • Work closely with developers and other stakeholders to ensure designs meet brand and technical requirements. • Use various software programs, such as Adobe Creative Suite, to create visuals. • Ensure designs are cohesive, professional, and in-line with brand guidelines. • Present concepts and designs to stakeholders for feedback and approval. • Monitor trends in design and technology, staying up to date on latest industry best practices. Qualifications • Bachelor’s degree in fine art, graphic design, or related field. • 2+ years of experience in a multimedia, graphic design, or web design role. • Previous experience with UX and UI design. • Knowledgeable in industry trends and technologies. • Familiarity with Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). • Excellent eye for detail and aesthetic sense. • Strong **Technical Requirements:** 1. Extensive knowledge of design principles, techniques, software, and tools. 2. Strong interpersonal and communication skills. 3. A creative and innovative design style. 4. The ability to work well both independently and as part of a team. 5. Attention to detail and the ability to problem solve. 6. Demonstrable experience in developing user interfaces. 7. Knowledge of HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and other popular web technologies. 8. Understanding of digital marketing trends and techniques. 9. Excellent graphic design skills. 10. Knowledge of user experience (UX) trends and best practices. 11. Time management skills and the ability to multitask. 12. A passion for staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the world of design. **Task for the Expert:** Create a professional and attractive design for a new web and mobile application. The design should have a modern yet simple aesthetic, with intuitive navigation that both experienced and novice users can easily use. Utilize brand colors, fonts, and layout principles from the company to ensure consistency. Ensure the design works across multiple platforms including desktop, mobile, and tablet. Create detailed specifications that clearly outline how the design should be implemented.

title: Technical Project Manager with Feed App and React Experience
description: I am looking for a seasoned Technical Project Manager to lead the development of a cutting-edge enterprise employee engagement and training application. We are a fast-moving startup with a deep commitment to rapid innovation. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in managing the development of feed-based applications and proficiency in React and React Native technologies. Experience with tech startups that have successfully scaled up will be considered a significant plus. Responsibilities: - Oversee the extremely rapid technical development of our app/web app, ensuring adherence to high-quality standards and extremely rapid delivery. - Collaborate with stakeholders to refine project scope, objectives, and deliverables, focusing on a feed-based application experience. - Lead the technical team in implementing React (and potentially React Native) solutions, ensuring best practices are followed for scalability and rapid development, while optimizing for extreme speed and concurrency performance of the final solution. - Coordinate project schedules, resources, and information, keeping the project on track. - Identify and resolve technical issues and roadblocks. - Act as a liaison between technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring clear communication and understanding. - Foster an environment that supports Agile principles and methodologies (Scrum experience is a plus). Qualifications: - Proven experience as a Technical Project Manager in software development, particularly with feed-based applications. - Strong technical background with hands-on experience in React and React Native. - Experience working in or with tech startups on a rapid growth trajectory. - Excellent project management skills, with proficiency in Agile methodologies. - Strong problem-solving ability and analytical mindset. - Exceptional communication and leadership skills. - Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities in a dynamic environment. - Super adaptability & agility Application/Bid Requirements: 1. Detailed Project Portfolio: Please provide a portfolio of relevant projects you've managed, particularly those involving feed-based applications and React/React Native technologies. 2. LinkedIn Profile: Include a link to your professional LinkedIn profile. 3. Cover Letter: A brief cover letter explaining why you are a good fit for this role, including any experience with tech startups. 4. References: Contact information for at least two professional references, ideally from past projects similar to ours. 5. Please indicate whether, if offered, you would be open to joining the project as a full-time hire.

title: Experienced Next.js Developer for Integrating Strapi Database
description: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Next.js developer to integrate Strapi as the backend database for our existing web application. This project involves setting up a robust and efficient connection between our Next.js frontend and Strapi, ensuring seamless data flow and optimal performance. **Key Responsibilities:** - Analyze the current architecture of our Next.js web application. - Set up and configure Strapi as the backend database solution. - Integrate Strapi with our Next.js application, ensuring smooth data retrieval and manipulation. - Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms between Next.js and Strapi. - Optimize the application for maximum speed and scalability. - Ensure data security and compliance with data protection regulations. - Collaborate with our team to understand specific requirements and provide technical solutions. - Conduct thorough testing to identify and fix bugs or issues. - Provide documentation and support for future maintenance and upgrades. **Required Skills and Qualifications:** - Proven experience in developing applications with Next.js and Strapi. - Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and experience in integrating them with Next.js. - Proficiency in JavaScript, especially ES6 and later versions. - Experience with database design, management, and optimization. - Familiarity with authentication protocols and security best practices. - Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. - Excellent communication and collaboration abilities. **Desirable Skills (Not Mandatory):** - Experience with other headless CMS platforms. - Knowledge of front-end technologies like React, HTML5, and CSS3. - Familiarity with server-side rendering and static site generation in Next.js.

title: Figma UI/UX responsive design for a web application
description: We are actively seeking a talented UI/UX Designer with specialized skills in Figma and Figma Prototyping for our learning management application. This hourly role is ideal for someone who is adept in using Figma for both high-fidelity design work and dynamic prototyping. The focus will be refining the admin and user interfaces to enhance usability and visual appeal. If you have a strong portfolio demonstrating your expertise in Figma and a user-centric design approach, we invite you to apply. Key Responsibilities: Figma-Based Design: Utilize Figma to create responsive and visually compelling UI designs for admin and user interfaces. Advanced Prototyping: Develop interactive prototypes using Figma to demonstrate and test design concepts. User Experience Enhancement: Analyze user feedback and behavior to improve navigation and usability, employing Figma’s collaborative features for iterative design. Consistency and Standards: Adhere to design guidelines, leveraging Figma’s shared libraries and components for design consistency across the application. Iterative Design Feedback: Incorporate stakeholder feedback into designs using Figma’s collaboration tools. Keeping Up to Date: Stay informed on the latest features and best practices in Figma and UI/UX design trends. Qualifications: Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer, particularly with Figma for design and prototyping. A strong portfolio showcasing responsive design and prototyping projects in Figma. Good understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript related to design implementation. Excellent visual design skills with a focus on user-system interaction. Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively. Strong communication skills for effective teamwork and feedback implementation. Experience in designing for learning management systems or similar platforms is a plus.

title: Senior Mobile and Web Application Developer - NativeScript Expertise
description: 1. **Mobile App Development:** Design, build, and maintain high-quality mobile apps using NativeScript, ensuring that these apps are optimized for both performance and usability. 2. **Web Application Development:** Create web versions of mobile applications ensuring seamless functionality across different browsers and devices. 3. **Cross-platform Integration:** Ensure smooth interoperability of applications across various platforms including iOS, Android, and web. 4. **Optimization:** Develop efficient, scalable, and maintainable code that can handle large user bases and data volumes. 5. **Collaborate:** Work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and other developers to implement versatile front-end and back-end solutions. 6. **Debugging:** Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks, ensuring the highest quality application performance. 7. **Stay Updated:** Keep abreast with the latest in NativeScript, mobile, and web technologies and best practices to ensure our applications remain cutting-edge. 8. **Mentorship:** Provide guidance and mentorship to junior developers, helping them elevate their skills and understanding of application development. **Required Skills & Qualifications:** 1. 5+ Years experience required. 2. Proven experience with NativeScript and its nuances, including ES6+ syntax. 3. Demonstrated experience in building large-scale mobile applications with high user engagement. 4. Proficiency in web development technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and relevant web frameworks. 5. Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect applications to back-end services. 6. Strong understanding of mobile and web application design principles, patterns, and best practices. 7. Ability to write clean, readable, and maintainable code. 8. Exceptional problem-solving skills and attention to detail. 9. Communicate regularly and provide daily commits/updates. 10. Familiarity with code versioning tools such as Git. **Desirable Qualifications:** 1. Experience with other mobile development frameworks (e.g., React Native, Flutter). 2. Knowledge of CI/CD processes and tools.

title: React Native developer for IndiGG iOS App
description: Introduction IndiGG wants to develop an iOS app and replicate the features currently created on Android App to the iOS app as well. This will help us gain: More reach especially with International users More quality players Current Android App Play Store link(https://play.google.com/store/search?q=indigg&c=apps&hl=en-IN) Technical details of current Android App: Features: Login Profile Game discovery Quest Clan Tournaments Wallet Notification system Third party integrations Web3Auth for wallet Wallet connect for external connections Firebase notifications OTPless whatsapp login for international users Tech stack React native version v0.70.6 Javascript/Typescript Redux-toolkit(with thunk middleware) REST API to communicate with backend (backend in nodejs) Requirements for the IoS App Features All features available on IndiGG Android App till 23rd Dec Versions and Devices All variations of the following series iPhone 11 iPhone SE 2 iPhone 12 iPhone 13 iPhone SE 3 iPhone 14 iPhone 15 iOS Versions -16,17 Technical Implementation Details Upgrade react native version to implement as per new architecture of RN (optional) Splash screen and Icons as per all device sizes need to be added Some third party packages might need to be replaced or upgraded. expo packages patched packages Some third party services we are using might need handling as per their IOS native linking web3Auth WalletConnect Deep-links handling notifications OTPLess UI/UX handling as per Platform will be needed to be handled Statusbar SafeAreaViews Shadows Fonts Keyboard handling TextInput behaviours Touches handling (Buttons with position absolute) All heights and widths for responsiveness on ios devices Current designs of the android app features are for 393px x 812px. For iOS we will use 375*667 px (iPhone SE) to cater to maximum users as development on a smaller screen size can be easily adapted to a larger screen size while the vice versa has more complications

title: Software Developer for Class II Electronic Pull Tab Games - Slot Machine Experience
description: We are searching for a highly skilled Software Developer to create Class II electronic pull tab games that capture all the elements of a traditional slot machine experience. These games must retain high-end graphics, engaging sound effects, and features like "Free Spins" while adhering to the Class II classification, where game outcomes are predetermined, not determined by a random number generator (RNG). Our project entails the development of 8 games, with the first game needed within a tight timeframe of 7-10 days. Key Responsibilities: 1) Collaborate closely with our team to conceptualize and design Class II electronic pull tab games that replicate the allure of a traditional slot machine, including high-quality graphics and fun sounds. 2) Develop the game logic and functionality to deliver an immersive and exciting gaming experience, ensuring that game outcomes are predetermined. 3) Create an intuitive and visually stunning user interface (UI) that mirrors the aesthetics of a traditional slot machine. Implement game graphics, animations, and features like "Free Spins" to enhance player engagement. 4) Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure the games run flawlessly and provide a genuine slot machine-like experience. Optimize the software for performance and compatibility across various devices and platforms. Requirements: Proven expertise in game development, specifically in Class II electronic pull tab games that replicate the appeal of traditional slots. Proficiency in coding languages such as Unity, C#, or other relevant technologies. Strong UI/UX design skills to create an attractive and user-friendly interface that emulates traditional slot machines. Ability to deliver outstanding results within tight deadlines. Exceptional communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Previous experience on Upwork or similar platforms is a plus. If you are a talented software developer capable of delivering Class II electronic pull tab games that maintain the excitement and allure of traditional slots with high-end graphics, engaging sounds, and "Free Spins," we want to hear from you. Join us in crafting captivating and entertaining games for our audience. Please include your portfolio and relevant work samples in your application.

The developer should have experience in the following areas:

title: Wordpress Integration with Stuart APIs
description: We need a developer to integrate order page in Wordpress with the Stuart API: when an order has a certain status, it will create a delivery booking in Stuart through the API. A CMS may be needed to create "My Account" section, "My Orders" section, the customer has a link that allows him to follow his delivery person in real time on a map! You can vary Stuart prices (in% or fixed value) You set the minimum order to offer free Stuart delivery You set the order preparation time You choose the city (ies) available for the delivery method Stuart in the UK cities You select the days and opening hours of the point of sale / shipment The user chooses the type of vehicle and sees each price displayed The customer is notified each time the delivery status is changed To learn more about Stuart Api, click the link below. https://delivery.grubforrk.com

title: API Development Expert Needed for Troubleshooting and Optimization
description: We are seeking an experienced API and Machine Learning Development Expert, with a strong background in Swift, Azure cloud services, and OCR technologies. The project involves an API with OCR capabilities that is experiencing performance and functionality issues. The ideal candidate will have expertise in both API troubleshooting and ML-based OCR systems, and a solid understanding of Swift code. Responsibilities: Conduct a comprehensive audit of our existing API, with a focus on OCR-related functionalities. Optimize the API for better performance, including response time improvements and efficient data processing. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to both API functionality and ML-based OCR components. Provide recommendations for long-term API and OCR system improvements. Collaborate with our development team to implement effective solutions.

title: Need Long-Term Developer for Wordpress Plugins and Shopify Apps
description: I am looking for a development partner to work on Wordpress plugins and Shopify apps for me. Would like to work on a milestone basis - for example, $X fixed fee for each completed plugin/release. I would also need ongoing support to ensure plugins and apps remain compatible with new Wordpress and Shopify versions. Developer would own the application development and support from beginning to end.

title: Ionic app, forms, authentication.
description:
I need an ionic mobile app designed & built, that is ready to be compiled into IOS and Android mobile apps. The app includes an authentication process, as well as 7 forms and list views. The backend is already deployed and is using GraphQL, and provides an API SDK in TypeScript with all the functions that are required to build the project.

You will have to come up with agreeable form fields and perhaps build a few custom components, i.e. represent color in the form view.

title: Developer Sportsbook API
description:
Hello,

I have a browser extension, that connects to Flashscore.pt // flashscore.com, and based on the games, the user selects, he/she can also select the type of bet. From this, the user presses the submit and it sends the information to the bookie which will automatically select the games. Currently, this is being done, game by game, through a web scrapping process, therefore the user is actually seeing the bot running on the background (selecting buttons, etc..). 

I want to understand if there is a possibility of a headless API, where once I click "Submit" on my extension, the bookie will have automatically the selected games on its account, instead of actually seeing the bot pressing the buttons.

Does this make sense? Someone expert with APIs should have a better undestanding of this than me.

Have a nice day, thank you.
João Santos

title: NFT Expert Pas
description: Duties and responsibilities: • Analyze NFT market trends, evaluate new products and services, and provide insights to the development team • Manage a portfolio of NFTs and provide detailed analysis and recommendations • Collect and document requirements, developing project plans, cost estimates, and resources • Oversee the implementation of NFT projects, and ensure that guidelines are followed • Monitor the performance and success of NFTs and report to senior management • Research and develop strategies to optimize NFT performance • Work alongside software developers and marketers to create and test innovative products • Keep up to date with the latest developments in blockchain technology, digital asset security, and digital asset markets • Manage the generation of tokens, exchanges, and integration of NFTs into existing software • Develop user manuals, system documentation, and training materials **Technical Requirements:** 1. Expertise in blockchain technology and Distributed Ledger Technologies (DLT). 2. Familiarity with the NFT marketplace, tokenization of assets, digital collectibles, and gaming platforms. 3. Knowledge of Ethereum and its smart contract capabilities, token standards, tokenomics, and DeFi projects. 4. Understanding of the legal, regulatory, and compliance requirements related to using NFTs. 5. Ability to assess business needs and advise clients on use-case scenarios and strategies for utilizing NFTs. 6. Sound understanding of the technical and economic implications of using NFTs. 7. Understanding of the various smart contracts and dApps related to NFTs. 8. Knowledge of security best practices when dealing with NFTs. 9. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and analytical skills. 10. Ability to explain complex topics to non-technical audiences. **Task for the Expert:** 1. Research and develop a comprehensive strategy for deploying a Non-Fungible Token (NFT) platform. 2. Analyze the legal requirements necessary for developing and operating a successful NFT platform. 3. Explore potential security risks associated with the storage and transactions of NFTs and develop mitigation strategies to protect the platform. 4. Implement an effective system to track asset ownership and trading history of each NFT. 5. Develop innovative marketing strategies to promote the NFT platform. 6. Monitor existing and upcoming technologies that could increase the usability and value of the platform. 7. Establish partnerships with other industry players to generate traction for the platform. 8. Create tutorials and other educational materials to help users make effective use of the platform. 9. Generate detailed reports to track the performance and adoption of the NFT platform. 10. Utilize analytical and machine learning tools to optimize the platform.
